subject: Re: [junit] kjava, kvm testing
msgSnippet: ... Well, since current J2ME environments do not support reflection, junit is likely to have some trouble.... Might be able to get by if you stick to explicit
messageBody:
--- joe fu <jfu@...> wrote:
>I know JUNIT is great for java testing. How about
>kjava running on kvm? Does anyone have experience on
>using that on JUNIT for API test? If so, can I have
>some tips on that?

Well, since current J2ME environments do not support reflection, junit
is likely to have some trouble....

Might be able to get by if you stick to explicit addTest calls, but I
suspect you will also run into some collection problems (J2ME does not
support Java 2 collections).

Regards,

Rob
